name: Elevated Life: Real Wellness and Transformation

episodes.title: Trust Yourself First - Taking Your Power Back from Wellness Gurus
episodes.description: Why do we keep looking for saviors instead of trusting ourselves? From fitness influencers to manifestation coaches to wellness practitioners, we've been conditioned from childhood to believe someone else knows better than we do. But what if the answer was never outside of you? What if you already have what you need—you just haven't built the muscle of self-trust yet? What we get into: How we're taught from a young age not to trust ourselves—parents, teachers, pastors all saying "I know better, I'm older than you"—and then suddenly at 18 we're supposed to magically trust ourselves with everything The red flags that someone's crossing from guidance into guru territory—when "it didn't work, let's try something else" becomes "it didn't work, it's your fault" Why absolutes are a warning sign—"the only way to lose weight is carnivore," "if you've been squatting like this you're wrong," "you didn't manifest correctly" How real guidance looks—walking alongside you, holding up a mirror (not a window for you to look at them), teaching you so you don't need them forever The questions to ask yourself: Am I really doing the work? Does this make sense for my body? Is this person empowering me or keeping me dependent? Why our goal as trainers is NOT client retention—we want you to learn, take your power back, and become confident doing this on your own We're walking through the difference between helpful guidance and cult-like dependency, why you're not broken (you're just where you're at right now), and how to stop running from Reiki to therapy to tarot to the next guru promising they have your answer. You don't need another seminar. You need yourself, some discipline, and a mirror. Self-trust is a muscle that has to be developed. Start building it. Want more tools for your transformation? Sign up for our free weekly newsletter at cjelevatedlife.com—every Monday you'll get motivation, mindset shifts, and actionable micro-skills to keep you moving forward.
